title: Unable to reset password
description: User reports that the password reset process fails after submission.

title: Payment gateway error
description: Payment gateway returns an error code during checkout process.

title: Mobile app crashing frequently
description: The app crashes every time the user tries to view notifications.

title: Feature request: Multi-language
description: Customer requested adding Spanish and French language options.

title: Email verification link expired
description: Verification link in email expires within 2 minutes of receiving it.

title: Invoice shows wrong total
description: Customer invoice total amount does not match selected services.

title: Website loads slowly on mobile
description: Mobile version of the website takes over 10 seconds to load.

title: Unable to download PDF report
description: User is unable to download generated PDF reports from dashboard.

title: Lost data after app update
description: Customer reports losing saved data after installing new update.

title: Account locked after failed login
description: User account got locked after three incorrect password attempts.

title: Dark mode not saving preferences
description: Dark mode setting resets after every logout and login.

title: Live chat not working
description: Live chat feature on support page does not connect to agents.

title: Broken image links on homepage
description: Several images on homepage are broken and not loading properly.

title: Two-factor authentication
description: 2FA codes are not being sent to users' registered devices.
